Class AcidDrop

java.lang.Object
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model.MapItem
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model.Creature
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model.AcidDrop
public class AcidDrop extends Creature
AcidDrop are creatures that can only move, hit then die.
